title: MySQLLENGTH()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLLENGTH()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return the length of the string, in bytes:
SELECT LENGTH("SQL Tutorial") AS LengthOfString;

Definition and Usage
The LENGTH() function returns the length of a string (in bytes).
Syntax
LENGTH(
string
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. The string to count the length for
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0
More Examples
Example
Return the length of the text in the "CustomerName" column, in bytes:
SELECT LENGTH(CustomerName) AS LengthOfName
FROM Customers;

★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
SELECT LENGTH(CustomerName) AS LengthOfName
FROM Customers;

summary: This tutorial covers MySQLLENGTH()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MySQLLENGTH()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MySQLLENGTH()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
